price: অথবা তাতকৈও অলপ বেছি। লগতে স্পষ্টভাৱে ধীৰে ধীৰে কোৰআন তিলাৱাত কৰা।
arabic: أَوۡ زِدۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَرَتِّلِ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَرۡتِيلًا

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: aw zid ʿalayhi warattili al-qur'āna tartīlan
